languages.text: "Я благодарна, Амик'Абеляр. Надеюсь, ксеносу не под силу обмануть ваше чутье, как он обманул мое".
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."
languages.original_text: "Я благодарна, Амик'Абеляр. Надеюсь, ксеносу не под силу обмануть ваше чутье, как он обманул мое".

traits.locale_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard, even for a comforting lie."
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard, even for a comforting lie."
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."
"I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

languages.text: "Vielen Dank, Amic'Abelard. Ich hoffe, der Xenos kann Eure Instinkte nicht täuschen wie er mich getäuscht hat."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

traits.locale_text: "Vielen Dank, Amic'Abelard. Ich hoffe, der Xenos kann Eure Instinkte nicht täuschen wie er mich getäuscht hat."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie, Amic'Abélard. J'espère que le xénos ne vous a pas embrumé l'esprit comme il l'a fait avec le mien. »
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie, Amic'Abélard. J'espère que le xénos ne vous a pas embrumé l'esprit comme il l'a fait avec le mien. »

languages.text: «Le doy las gracias, Amic'Abelard. Espero que los xenos no hagan mella en sus sentidos como pasó con los míos».
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

traits.locale_text: «Le doy las gracias, Amic'Abelard. Espero que los xenos no hagan mella en sus sentidos como pasó con los míos».

languages.text: 「感謝する、家令長さん。あの異種族が我の本能を欺いたように、あなたは騙されないことを願っている」
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

traits.locale_text: 「感謝する、家令長さん。あの異種族が我の本能を欺いたように、あなたは騙されないことを願っている」

languages.text: “我很感激，信者阿贝拉德。希望那些异形不会像欺骗我那样，欺骗你的直觉。”
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

traits.locale_text: “我很感激，信者阿贝拉德。希望那些异形不会像欺骗我那样，欺骗你的直觉。”

languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."

languages.text: "Müteşekkirim Amik'Abelard. Umarım ki zeno, benim içgüdülerimi yanılttığı gibi seninkileri de yanıltmaz."
languages.original_text: "I am grateful, Amic'Abelard. I hope the xenos cannot deceive your instincts as he deceived mine."
